name: Skat 3D Premium
description:
Realistic 3D Skat simulation with singleplayer, multiplayer and tutorial. With configurable AI strength and many adjustable rule and game variants you can start exciting Skat tournaments - or just play for fun.

Compete with tricky computer opponents, or play relaxing rounds with friends or family in online mode!

Game environment, cards, rule variants and much more can be customized! For beginners, there is an animated tutorial in which the Skat game is completely explained step by step.Features:
  • Singleplayer mode with configurable opponents
  • Many rule variations with popular Bock- and Ramsch-rounds
  • Multiplayer mode with LAN or Online mode
  • High Quality full animated 3D graphics
  • Lots of tables, rooms and decks
  • High-performance A.I.: different levels of difficulty
  • Voice output and sound
  • Highscore lists
  • HD widescreen output
  • Tutorial, detailed game instructions and help
